name: freehand
content:

(of a drawing) done without the help of any special equipment for accurately creating circles, straight lines, symbols, etc.: a freehand sketch

(of a design or picture) drawn while holding a pen, pencil, etc., without the help of any special equipment: She made a freehand sketch of the layout of the apartment.
